category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 32 (Work Leader)
contents: Article 32 (Work Leader) ① When carrying out work stipulated in the main text of Article 39 (1) of the Safety and Health Rules, the Chairman of the Board of Directors must prepare a work plan. ② The Chairman of the Board of Directors is the person who directs and supervises the work under Paragraph 1. is designated as the work commander, and the work leader must direct and supervise the work according to the work plan.
